verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: endorsed] [ARG1: both state Rep. Katie Arrington , who beat U.S. Rep. Mark Sanford , and Gov. Henry McMaster , now in a runoff with John Warren] .
Trump endorsed [ARG0: both state Rep. Katie Arrington] , [R-ARG0: who] [V: beat] [ARG1: U.S. Rep. Mark Sanford] , and Gov. Henry McMaster , now in a runoff with John Warren .
